circumstances: On final approach in poor weather conditions, the twin engine aircraft went out of control, struck trees and crashed in an open field located short of runway threshold. The airplane was destroyed and all five occupants were killed.
probable_cause:
Improper IFR operation on part of the pilot-in-command. The following factors were considered as contributing:
- Improper compensation for wind coditions, 
- Sudden windshift, 
- Erratic flight path after passing outer marker, 
- ILS straight-in approach,
- Strong windshift reported at approximately 400 feet.
